actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to clarify that certain technical assistance grants shall be treated for Federal tax purposes as being made for a charitable purpose.

summary.text: Treats as tax-deductible charitable contributions certain grants providing technical assistance to establish businesses in the Flint, Michigan, area.

titles.title: A bill to clarify that certain technical assistance grants shall be treated for Federal tax purposes as being made for a charitable purpose.
